parameters.name: FaceObj
parameters.description: Face on which to count the facets

title: ITessellation.IGetFaceFacetsCount2
description: Gets the number of facets corresponding to a face.

parameters.name: FaceObj
parameters.description: Face on which to count the facets

remarks:
This method caches the raw facet data after determining the number of facets. A subsequent call to
ITessellation::IGetFaceFacets2
does not have to fetch the facet data again.
